Boutaiba Sghir (amụrụ na June 4, 1945) bụ onye Algeria na-agụ egwu 'raï' na onye na-ede egwu.
N'afọ 1963, o wepụtara egwu mbụ ya, mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na asatọ, Chetek el Berah
N'afọ 1963, o mere ihe ngosi egwu mbụ ya "Scène d'été" na Chaabet El Ham na Aïn Témouchent
Ihe ịga nke ọma mbụ ya bịara na 1968 n'egwu El Caoucaou
Mgbe ahụ ọ bụ onye na-akpọ violin maka ndị egwú nke redio Oran site na 1967 ruo 1969
N'afọ 1969, a tọhapụrụ Raba Raba na El Fermliya ma ọha na eze ka na-enwe ekele ruo taa.
Dị ka ọtụtụ ndị na-agu egwu raï nke ọgbọ ya, ọ malitere ọrụ egwu raï ya na ngwụcha afọ ndị 1960 na egwu Melhoun Bedoui (nke a na-akpọkwa ochie raï).
Ya na Boussouar El Maghnaoui, Bouteldja Belkacem na onye egwu Gana El Maghna oui, ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị nna nke raï nke oge a (nke a na-akpọkwa pop Bedoui ma ọ bụ pop raï)
Boutaiba Sghir esokwawo Messaoud Bellemou, onye a ma ama na-afụ opi na Algeria.
Boutaiba Sghir ga-akpali ọtụtụ ndị na-agụ egwu dịka Cheb Khaled
Cheb Khaled ga-ekwu banyere ya: "Abụghị m eze nke rai, abụ m onye nnọchi anya
Ezigbo eze bụ Boutaiba Sghir, ọ bụ ya kụziiri m ihe niile".

N'ajụjụ ọnụ maka vidiyo Algeria banyere akụkọ ihe mere eme Raï naanị na Algeria (lee njikọ mpụga), Boutaiba Sghir gwara onye nta akụkọ Algeria "A machibidoro egwu raï na mgbasa ozi Algeria niile (radio na TV) n'oge afọ ndị 1970"
Ọ bụ ya mere na enweghị vidiyo nke ndị na-agụ egwú raï Algeria na TV Algeria ma ọ bụ ihe ndekọ redio na 70s

O kwupụtakwara na vidiyo dị iche iche na YouTube na Cheb Hasni abụghị onye na-agụ egwú Raï kama ọ bụ onye na-abụ egwú Asri nakwa na pop raï (nke a na-akpọkwa Bedoui nke oge a ma ọ bụ raï nke oge a) dị tupu ọbịbịa nke onye na-afụ opi Bellemou.
Na Septemba 2010, Cheb Khaled kpọrọ Boutaiba Sghir na Maurice El Medioni, Cheb Sahraoui na Chaba Zahouania na Paris maka ihe ngosi egwu iji kwanyere Oran ùgwù, nke akpọrọ Oran Café
